abstract: The Serious Fraud Office said it had charged Alstom Network UK with six corruption-related offenses linked to contracts in India, Tunisia and Poland.
snippet: The Serious Fraud Office said it had charged Alstom Network UK with six corruption-related offenses linked to contracts in India, Tunisia and Poland.
lead_paragraph: PARIS — British authorities said on Thursday that they had brought criminal charges against a unit of Alstom, the French industrial conglomerate that is selling its energy business to General Electric. A five-year investigation, authorities said, found evidence of corruption in large transport contracts in India, Tunisia and Poland.

headline.main: Britain Brings Corruption Charges Against Unit of Alstom
headline.print_headline: Alstom Charged With Corruption After British Investigation
